testModeInfo: Test Mode! Results will be saved to your profile. You can only play one test at a time.
practiceModeInfo: Practice Mode! Results will not be saved to your profile, and you can play as many times as you want.

termASelectionContent: Here you can select the possible range of numbers for Term A - the left hand number in the question. Then choose multiples of numbers within that range. This allows you to customize the difficulty and focus of the math problems.
termBSelectionContent: Here you can select the possible range of numbers for Term B - the right hand number in the question. Then choose multiples of numbers within that range. This allows you to customize the difficulty and focus of the math problems.
comeBackSoon: Come back soon to see your performance!
